text: One of the best sushi restaurants I have been to. They are so nice and friendly and they really make an effort to deliver superior quality sushi. It is so good, at one point, I was eating here once per week. I definitely recommend this restaurant to anyone who likes good quality sushi.

Un must pour les amateurs de sushi de la Rive-Sud. Ne surtout pas se fier aux apparences.

Prix compétitifs, grande variété et ingrédients frais.  Service courtois.

Toujours bon, en salle à manger ou pour emporter.

My favourite sushis.
If you feel adventurous try the combo for two :) a lot of specialties from the chef.

Great staff. Worth the detour!!
